plot: Betrayed by the ruling families of Italy, a young man embarks upon an epic quest for vengeance. To eradicate corruption and restore his family's honour, he will learn the art of the assassins. To his allies, Ezio will become a force for change, fighting for freedom and justice. To his enemies, he will become a threat.
characters: Niccol√≤ Machiavelli, Pope Alexander VI, Lorenzo de' Medici, Ezio Auditore da Firenze, Maria Auditore, Giovanni Auditore, Petruccio Auditore, Claudia Auditore, Leonardo da Vinci
